entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 14.
